squidpony.squidgrid.generation

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.generation.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single map space. All spaces are initialy marked as not seen by the player.
    Author:
    Eben Howard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile()
      Creates a tile with no monster or wall.
      Tile(boolean wall)
      Creates a tile that is a wall.
      Tile(Monster monster)
      Creates a tile with the provided monster and no wall.
